snippet: The second phase of the Boston Marathon bombing trial is to begin April 21, the day after the running of the annual road race.
abstract: Sentencing phase of Boston Marathon bombing trial is set to begin April 21; Dzhokhar Tsarnaev was convicted of all 30 counts in case.
lead_paragraph: The second phase of the Boston Marathon bombing trial is to begin April 21, the day after the running of the annual road race.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Sentencing Phase Set in Marathon Trial
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Sentencing Phase Set in Marathon Trial
